verses.verse: And He said <WG3004> to His disciples, <WG3101> "It is inevitable <WG418> <WG3361> that stumbling <WG4625> blocks <WG4625> should come, <WG2064> but woe <WG3759> to him through <WG1223> whom <WG3739> they come! <WG2064>

"It would be better <WG3081> for him if <WG1487> a millstone <WG3037> <WG3457> were hung <WG4029> around <WG4012> his neck <WG5137> and he were thrown <WG4496> into the sea, <WG2281> than <WG2228> that he should cause <WG4624> one <WG1520> of these <WG3778> little <WG3398> ones <WG3398> to stumble. <WG4624>
"Be on your guard! <WG4337> If <WG1437> your brother <WG80> sins, <WG264> rebuke <WG2008> him; and if <WG1437> he repents, <WG3340> forgive <WG863> him.

"And if <WG1437> he sins <WG264> against <WG1519> you seven <WG2034> times <WG2034> a day, <WG2250> and returns <WG1994> to you seven <WG2034> times, <WG2034> saying, <WG3004> 'I repent, <WG3340>' forgive <WG863> him."
And the apostles <WG652> said <WG3004> to the Lord, <WG2962> "Increase <WG4369> our faith! <WG4102>"

And the Lord <WG2962> said, <WG3004> "If <WG1487> you had <WG2192> faith <WG4102> like <WG5613> a mustard <WG4615> seed, <WG2848> you would say <WG3004> to this <WG3778> mulberry <WG4807> tree, <WG4807> 'Be uprooted <WG1610> and be planted <WG5452> in the sea <WG2281>'; and it would obey <WG5219> you.

" But which <WG5101> of you, having <WG2192> a slave <WG1401> plowing <WG722> or <WG2228> tending <WG4165> sheep, <WG4165> will say <WG3004> to him when he has come <WG1525> in from the field, <WG68> 'Come <WG3928> immediately <WG2112> and sit <WG377> down <WG377> to eat'?

"But will he not say <WG3004> to him, 'Prepare <WG2090> something <WG5101> for me to eat, <WG1172> and [properly] clothe <WG4024> yourself and serve <WG1247> me until <WG2193> I have eaten <WG2068> and drunk; <WG4095> and afterward <WG3326> <WG3778> you will eat <WG2068> and drink <WG4095>'?
"He does not thank <WG5485> the slave <WG1401> because <WG3754> he did <WG4160> the things which were commanded, <WG1299> does he?

"So <WG3779> you too, <WG2532> when <WG3752> you do <WG4160> all <WG3956> the things <WG3956> which are commanded <WG1299> you, say, <WG3004> 'We are unworthy <WG888> slaves; <WG1401> we have done <WG4160> [only] that which <WG3739> we ought <WG3784> to have done. <WG4160>'"
And it came <WG1096> about while <WG1722> He was on the way <WG4198> to Jerusalem, <WG2419> that He was passing <WG1330> between <WG1223> <WG3319> Samaria <WG4540> and Galilee. <WG1056>
And as He entered <WG1525> a certain <WG5100> village, <WG2968> ten <WG1176> leprous <WG3015> men <WG435> who <WG3739> stood <WG2476> at a distance <WG4207> met <WG528> Him;
and they raised <WG142> their voices, <WG5456> saying, <WG3004> "Jesus, <WG2424> Master, <WG1988> have <WG1653> mercy <WG1653> on us!"

And when He saw <WG3708> them, He said <WG3004> to them, "Go <WG4198> and show <WG1925> yourselves <WG1438> to the priests. <WG2409>" And it came <WG1096> about that as they were going, <WG5217> they were cleansed. <WG2511>
Now <WG1161> one <WG1520> of them, when he saw <WG3708> that he had been healed, <WG2390> turned <WG5290> back, <WG5290> glorifying <WG1392> God <WG2316> with a loud <WG3173> voice, <WG5456>
and he fell <WG4098> on his face <WG4383> at His feet, <WG4228> giving <WG2168> thanks <WG2168> to Him. And he was a Samaritan. <WG4541>
And Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and said, <WG3004> "Were there not ten <WG1176> cleansed <WG2511>? But the nine <WG1767> â€“ where <WG4226> are they?
"Was no <WG3756> one found <WG2147> who turned <WG5290> back <WG5290> to give <WG1325> glory <WG1391> to God, <WG2316> except <WG1508> this <WG3778> foreigner <WG241>?"
And He said <WG3004> to him, "Rise, <WG450> and go <WG4198> your way; <WG4198> your faith <WG4102> has made <WG4982> you well. <WG4982>"

Now <WG1161> having been questioned <WG1905> by the Pharisees <WG5330> as to when <WG4219> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> was coming, <WG2064> He answered <WG611> them and said, <WG3004> "The kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> is not coming <WG2064> with signs <WG3907> to be observed <WG3907> ;

nor <WG3761> will they say, <WG3004> 'Look, <WG2400> here <WG5602> [it is!]' or, <WG2228> 'There <WG1563> [it is!]' For behold, <WG2400> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> is in your midst. <WG1787> "

And He said <WG3004> to the disciples, <WG3101> "The days <WG2250> shall come <WG2064> when <WG3753> you will long <WG1937> to see <WG3708> one <WG1520> of the days <WG2250> of the Son <WG5207> of Man, <WG444> and you will not see <WG3708> it.
"And they will say <WG3004> to you, 'Look <WG2400> there! <WG1563> Look <WG2400> here! <WG5602>' Do not go <WG565> away, <WG565> and do not run <WG1377> after <WG1377> [them.]

"For just <WG5618> as the lightning, <WG796> when it flashes <WG797> out of one part of the sky, <WG3772> shines <WG2989> to the other part of the sky, <WG3772> so <WG3779> will the Son <WG5207> of Man <WG444> be in His day. <WG2250>
"But first <WG4413> He must <WG1163> suffer <WG3958> many <WG4183> things <WG4183> and be rejected <WG593> by this <WG3778> generation. <WG1074>
"And just <WG2531> as it happened <WG1096> in the days <WG2250> of Noah, <WG3575> so <WG3779> it shall be also <WG2532> in the days <WG2250> of the Son <WG5207> of Man: <WG444>

they were eating, <WG2068> they were drinking, <WG4095> they were marrying, <WG1060> they were being given <WG7031> in marriage, <WG7031> until <WG891> the day <WG2250> that Noah <WG3575> entered <WG1525> the ark, <WG2787> and the flood <WG2627> came <WG2064> and destroyed <WG622> them all. <WG3956>

"It was the same <WG3668> as happened <WG1096> in the days <WG2250> of Lot: <WG3091> they were eating, <WG2068> they were drinking, <WG4095> they were buying, <WG59> they were selling, <WG4453> they were planting, <WG5452> they were building; <WG3618>
but on the day <WG2250> that Lot <WG3091> went <WG1831> out from Sodom <WG4670> it rained <WG1026> fire <WG4442> and brimstone <WG2303> from heaven <WG3772> and destroyed <WG622> them all. <WG3956>
"It will be just <WG2596> the same <WG846> on the day <WG2250> that the Son <WG5207> of Man <WG444> is revealed. <WG601>

"On that day, <WG2250> let not the one who <WG3739> is on the housetop <WG1430> and whose <WG846> goods <WG4632> are in the house <WG3614> go <WG2597> down <WG2597> to take <WG142> them away; <WG142> and likewise <WG3668> let not the one who <WG3588> is in the field <WG68> turn <WG1994> back. <WG3694> <WG1994>
"Remember <WG3421> Lot's wife. <WG1135>
"Whoever <WG3739> <WG1437> seeks <WG2212> to keep <WG4046> his life <WG5590> shall lose <WG622> it, and whoever <WG3739> <WG302> loses <WG622> [his life] shall preserve <WG2225> it.
"I tell <WG3004> you, on that night <WG3571> there will be two <WG1417> men <WG1417> in one <WG1520> bed; <WG2825> one <WG1520> will be taken, <WG3880> and the other <WG2087> will be left. <WG863>
"There will be two <WG1417> women grinding <WG229> at the same <WG846> place; one <WG1520> will be taken, <WG3880> and the other <WG2087> will be left. <WG863>
["Two <WG1417> men <WG1417> will be in the field; <WG68> one <WG1520> will be taken <WG3880> and the other <WG2087> will be left. <WG863>"]

And answering <WG611> they said <WG3004> to Him, "Where, <WG4226> Lord <WG2962>?" And He said <WG3004> to them, "Where <WG3699> the body <WG4983> [is,] there <WG1563> also <WG2532> will the vultures <WG105> be gathered. <WG1996>"
